description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Conduct daily operation in Treasury Back Operations (TBO) and Remittance sections, mainly in charge of Money Market, Foreign Exchange, Bond, Remittance and other scopes of works of Operations.
              
              -	Assist Team leader & Department Head in projects handled by Team.
              
              -	Perform any other duties assigned by Management and Department Head.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Bachelor degree of Banking & Finance; Economics; Foreign Trade
              
              -	At least 02 years of relevant working experience in foreign banks or big local banks (Remittance/ Treasury operations)
              
              -	Native Vietnamese and fluent in English
              
              -	Hard working/ Team work spirit/ Detail oriented
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Competitive salary and bonus
               







                Insurances in accordance with company policy
               







                Good chance to study and develop career path stably
